patthana17.7:1.1: Akusalaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.7:2.1: Akusalaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.7:3.1: Abyākataṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
